person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Philadelphia , which fell from an NFC East tie with the Dallas Cowboys and Washington Redskins , go on the road against the New York Jets and then entertain Arizona .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Philadelphia |
| Dallas Cowboys |
| Washington Redskins |

The paragraph mentions "Philadelphia" as the team that goes on the road against the New York Jets and entertains Arizona. It also mentions "Dallas Cowboys" and "Washington Redskins" as the teams with which Philadelphia was tied in the NFC East.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Philadelphia |
| Dallas Cowboys |
| Washington Redskins |

The paragraph mentions "Philadelphia" as the team that goes on the road against the New York Jets and entertains Arizona. It also mentions "Dallas Cowboys" and "Washington Redskins" as the teams with which Philadelphia had been tied in the NFC East.

Note: "New York Jets" and "Arizona" are also valid entities, but they are not mentioned as "persons" in the paragraph.
